ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( PRIORVALUE(Reserved__c ) = true, NOT(ISNEW()), OR( $Profile.Name = "ICON_Corporate_EVERYWHERE", $Profile.Name = "ICON_Corporate", $Profile.Name = "ICONiCS_Corporate" ), My_Management_Zone_Level__c =false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to modify a reserved order that is not attached to your zone
